subject: My SIMSONN PRO Pedal isn't working.
description_text:
After purchasing my *SIMSONN PRO pedals* from AliExpress, I did not use
them for a period of time and only began using them recently. I
installed *software
version 2.1.2* from the official website and ran it. However, when I
connected the pedals via USB, a message saying *“Old Version”* appeared,
and the software began to lag intermittently.

Updating the firmware did not solve the problem. In some cases, the device
was briefly recognized, but it did not function properly. The axes were
still not detected, and the program continued to freeze and disconnect
repeatedly.

Next, I downloaded and ran *SimPedalsConfig_V4*, but when the pedals were
connected, the program continuously showed *“Not Responding.”* When the
pedals were not connected, this issue did not occur, so I could not proceed
with the setup.

Finally, I tried connecting the pedals using *FreeJoy*. The device was
recognized as *“Simsonn 1.7.1,”* but in all cases, the axes still did not
function at all.

As a student, I do not have the financial ability to spend a large amount
of money, which is why I chose to purchase these pedals. Unfortunately, the
product not functioning as expected has been very disappointing to me. I
sincerely ask for your assistance in resolving this issue.

(The grounding has been done correctly.)
(Please let me know if you need any additional information or photos to
help troubleshoot this problem.)

conversations.body_text: Additionally, I would also like to request the config file for SIMSONN PRO PEDAL version 1.7.1, as there may have been a problem during the Freejoy setup.
I already tried manual installation, but it didn't work :(

Additionally, updates to my SIMSONN MANAGER don't seem to be working properly. The percentage bar never fills, the app keeps lagging, and updates don't apply, leaving the app stuck in the "need to update" list.

Hi Dowon lee,  Please provide your order number and the pedal model, and you can also send a photo of the control box. I will then guide you through manually updating the firmware to restore it, so don’t worry.

I'm a boarding student, so please understand that my response may be delayed. I didn't purchase the product myself; my parents purchased it for me. I've contacted them and will let you know when I receive a reply.   The product name is SIMSONN PRO pedal. Version 1.7.1 firmware was installed. The control box is an older, open box with a grounding wire. I'll attach a photo later. The grounding is secure.
